typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM [dbo].[Persons]',
	format: 'query') ~> Sourcetb2
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM [dbo].[Persons1]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourcetb1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		PersonID = Sourcetb2@PersonID,
		LastName = Sourcetb2@LastName,
		FirstName = Sourcetb2@FirstName,
		Address = Sourcetb2@Address,
		City = Sourcetb2@City,
		LastName = sourcetb1@LastName,
		FirstName = sourcetb1@FirstName,
		Address = sourcetb1@Address,
		City = sourcetb1@City
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Sourcetb2, sourcetb1 join(Sourcetb2@PersonID == sourcetb1@PersonID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> target
